name: Towers Infinite
description:
Towers Infinite is a fascinating Sudoku-like logic game for iPhone. To win, you must fill a grid of numbers according to several constraints. Sounds familiar? If you like Sudoku, you’ll love Towers Infinite. The same basic constraints apply (one and only one cell of each value per line and column), but a whole new dimension is added to make the game more interesting!

Features:
- Easily readable game grid
- New redesign
